data.comment: The match has started at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Donyell Malen scores to make it 0-1 at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 44, An attacking Eindhoven player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Eindhoven are awarded a penalty ... Eran Zahavi botches the spot kick!
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Jayden Oosterwolde (Enschede) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Gijs Smal.
At Grolsch Veste Stadium, Chukwunonso Madueke has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 62, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Enschede.
Cody Gakpo is booked for the away team.
Goal! Danilo makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Chukwunonso Madueke with Mauro Junior.
Julio Pleguezuelo (Enschede) has received a yellow card from Pol van Boekel.
The away team have replaced Eran Zahavi with Mohammed Ihattaren. This is the second substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
In the minute 77, Ron Jans (Enschede) is making a second substitution, with Leeuwen Thijs Van replacing Halil Dervisoglu.
Luka Ilic is on a sub for Jesse Bosch for Enschede.
Ron Jans is making the team's fourth substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Lindon Selahi replacing Ramiz Zerrouki.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
